name: Wind Chaser Axe [1]
description: According to the user's description, waving the axe will make you feel the flow of wind.

name: Wind Chaser Axe [2]
description: According to the user's description, waving the axe will make you feel the flow of wind.

name: Wind Egg
description: The egg with wind attribute. After use, Your attack turns into wind attribute and the effect lasts 30 minutes. Unable to coexist with Rough Wind.

name: Wind Hammer [1]
description: The axe with the power of wind. Using the latest craftsmanship, Wind Ore is combined with the Rune array to make the axe.

name: Wind Hammer [2]
description: The axe with the power of wind. Using the latest craftsmanship, Wind Ore is combined with the Rune array to make the axe.

name: Wind Knife [1]
description: Daggers with the power of wind. Using the latest craftsmanship, Wind Ore is combined with the Rune array to make the sword.

name: Wind Knife [2]
description: Daggers with the power of wind. Using the latest craftsmanship, Wind Ore is combined with the Rune array to make the sword.

name: Wind Ore
description: A small yellow ore. It has wind attribute and can be made into Rough Wind after extraction.

name: Windhawk [1]
description: Combine the shortcoming of the axes which is its slow Attack Spd with powerful axes, and strengthen the slow Attack Spd by adding Wind Attributes.

name: Windhawk [2]
description: Combine the shortcoming of the axes which is its slow Attack Spd with powerful axes, and strengthen the slow Attack Spd by adding Wind Attributes.

name: Window of Wealth
description: His eyes are filled with desire for wealth, it is said that the God of Wealth would "prefer" a person like this.

name: Windperch Crest [1]
description: crown wore by every Pixie princess, made from the quartz that grows at the peak of Yggdrasil. "No matter where you are, Yggdrasil is at thy home. "——Pixie folk song

name: Windrunner Cape
description: The cloak used by Elf Lellis, it makes people move secretly. It is said that the user can get the favor of the wind.
effect: When Katar is equipped, Crit.Dmg ＋7%,[Loki's Nail IX] ＋ [Windrunner Cape]: ＋5% [Cross Ripper Slasher] damage

name: Windrunner Cape [1]
description: The cloak used by Elf Lellis, it makes people move secretly. It is said that the user can get the favor of the wind.
effect: When Katar is equipped, Crit.Dmg ＋7%,[Loki's Nail IX] ＋ [Windrunner Cape]: ＋5% [Cross Ripper Slasher] damage

name: Windtide Echo
description: No one knows where this piano came from, but its tone is like the whisper of the breeze, pulling the heartstrings of all who hear it.

name: Wing Staff [1]
description: The Rod with an elf of wind in it. Carrying it, the user will be faster when casting a spell.
effect: INT ＋5,When killing a monster with a single target skill, restore 5% HP and 5% SP (CoolDown: 10 seconds)
